alert.note: Alert for Macomb (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Macomb County through 445 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Macomb Township, or near Mount Clemens, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mount Clemens and Macomb Township around 435 PM EDT. Sterling Heights and Clinton around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ray Center, Chesterfield Township, New Haven, Utica, Washington and Shelby Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
